pages.title: A New Adventure
pages.text: Now, you have a very nice Tier 4 Rocket and you can go anywhere you want! So, after preparing for a new expedition, your rocket will start to fly and after few seconds, you are in space! You can see Earth and all the Solar System's Planets and some new planets... Wait, new Planets?$(br2)$(l)A New System!$()$(br)Indeed, a new system stands out from our good old Solar System. Intrigued, you may decide to go and see, and if you do, you'll discover some planets, very different from those you've previously seen...
